page.title: 09Shopping Facilities
page.content: receives one hundred gallons of milk daily from Northern Dairies in York. During his spare time he is a part- time farmer. The village shop is incorporated in the same building as the Post Office,but it is open 7 days a week.The shop sells groceries,fruit, vegetables,stationery,sweets and cigarettes. There are two electricians in Tollerton who are self employed. They repair electrical equipment in the York area.One puts wiring in new houses and rewires old houses. We have a garage in Tollerton.There are petrol pumps.They sell oil,batteries,exhaust pipes and tyres.They serve and repair vehicles and have a pick-up service.
